alert.note: Alert for Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BROWN...SOUTHERN OCONTO AND EASTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shawano, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawano, Pulaski, Gillett, Navarino Wildlife Area, Little Suamico, Chase, Oconto Falls, Abrams, Angelica, and Stiles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
